database.name: VIEW SSPR_COSTEMPLOYEE_V
database.view: SELECT e.name AS empleado, t.typeconcept AS value, to_char('') AS periodo, t.name AS concepto, c.taxid AS taxid_org, b.name AS org, n.year, n.c_year_id, e.c_bpartner_id, e.taxid AS taxid_employee, to_char(CASE WHEN e.em_sspr_documenttype = 'NI' THEN 'C' WHEN e.em_sspr_documenttype = 'P' THEN 'P' WHEN e.em_sspr_documenttype = 'SRT' THEN 'E' ELSE NULL END) AS tipoidentificacion, e.em_sspr_documentno AS numeroidentificacion, e.em_sspr_lastname AS empleadoapellido, e.em_sspr_firstname AS empleadonombre, o.value AS codigoestab, to_char(CASE WHEN m.countrycode = 'EC' THEN '01' ELSE '02' END) AS pais, m.em_sspr_coderesidence AS codigopais, to_char(CASE WHEN m.em_sspr_applyagreement = 'Y' THEN 'SI' ELSE 'NO' END) AS aplicaconvenio, to_char(CASE WHEN e.em_sspr_isdisabled = 'Y' THEN 'SI' ELSE 'NO' END) AS discapacitado, e.em_sspr_disability AS porcentajediscapacidad, to_char(COALESCE(CASE WHEN e.em_sspr_representsdisabled = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN p.em_sspr_documenttype = 'NI' THEN 'C' WHEN p.em_sspr_documenttype = 'P' THEN 'P' WHEN p.em_sspr_documenttype = 'SRT' THEN 'E' ELSE NULL END ELSE NULL END, 'N')) AS tipoidentdiscapacidad, to_char(COALESCE(CASE WHEN e.em_sspr_representsdisabled = 'Y' THEN p.taxid ELSE NULL END, '999')) AS numeroidentifdiscapacidad, CASE WHEN t.typeconcept = 'EH' THEN sum(s.amountdeductible) ELSE 0.00 END AS gastosvivienda, CASE WHEN t.typeconcept = 'EHE' THEN sum(s.amountdeductible) ELSE 0.00 END AS gastossalud, CASE WHEN t.typeconcept = 'EE' THEN sum(s.amountdeductible) ELSE 0.00 END AS gastoseducacion, CASE WHEN t.typeconcept = 'EF' THEN sum(s.amountdeductible) ELSE 0.00 END AS gastoalimentacion, CASE WHEN t.typeconcept = 'EC' THEN sum(s.amountdeductible) ELSE 0.00 END AS gastosvestimenta, z.taxid AS ruccontador FROM c_bpartner e LEFT JOIN sspr_costemployee r ON e.c_bpartner_id = r.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN sspr_costemployeeline s ON r.sspr_costemployee_id = s.sspr_costemployee_id LEFT JOIN sspr_codeformulary107 t ON s.sspr_codeformulary107_id = t.sspr_codeformulary107_id LEFT JOIN c_year n ON r.c_year_id = n.c_year_id LEFT JOIN ad_org b ON r.ad_org_id = b.ad_org_id LEFT JOIN ad_orginfo c ON b.ad_org_id = c.ad_org_id LEFT JOIN c_bpartner f ON c.c_bpartner_id = f.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN c_bpartner_location k ON e.c_bpartner_id = k.c_bpartner_id AND k.isactive = 'Y' LEFT JOIN c_location l ON k.c_location_id = l.c_location_id LEFT JOIN c_country m ON l.c_country_id = m.c_country_id LEFT JOIN c_bpartner p ON e.em_sspr_bpartner_disabled_id = p.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN sspr_establishmentcode o ON e.em_sspr_establishmentcode_id = o.sspr_establishmentcode_id LEFT JOIN ad_clientinfo y ON b.ad_client_id = y.ad_client_id LEFT JOIN c_bpartner z ON y.em_sspr_c_bpartner_id = z.c_bpartner_id WHERE e.isemployee = 'Y' AND s.amountdeductible <> 0 AND (((SELECT count(*) AS max FROM c_bpartner_location y_1 WHERE y_1.c_bpartner_id = e.c_bpartner_id)) = 0 OR k.created = ((SELECT max(y_1.created) AS max FROM c_bpartner_location y_1 WHERE y_1.c_bpartner_id = e.c_bpartner_id))) GROUP BY e.name, n.year, n.c_year_id, e.c_bpartner_id, t.typeconcept, t.name, c.taxid, b.name, b.description, m.countrycode, e.em_sspr_isdisabled, m.em_sspr_coderesidence, m.em_sspr_applyagreement, e.em_sspr_documenttype, e.em_sspr_documentno, e.em_sspr_disability, e.taxid, e.em_sspr_lastname, e.em_sspr_firstname, p.em_sspr_documenttype, p.taxid, o.value, e.em_sspr_representsdisabled, z.taxid ORDER BY e.name
